{"id":1250621619,"question_id":3384,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1714977467,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1250621619/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Word K-Periodic","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperationsToMakeKPeriodic(string word, int k) {\n        int n = word.length();\n        int operations = INT_MAX;\n\n        // Count the occurrences of each character\n        vector<int> freq(26, 0); // Assuming only lowercase English alphabets\n        for (char c : word) {\n            freq[c - 'a']++;\n        }\n\n        // Iterate over all possible characters\n        for (char c = 'a'; c <= 'z'; ++c) {\n            // If the character doesn't occur in the word, skip\n            if (freq[c - 'a'] == 0) continue;\n\n            // Calculate the number of operations to make the entire word k-periodic with character c\n            int count = 0;\n            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n                if ((i % k != 0 && word[i] == c) || (i % k == 0 && word[i] != c)) {\n                    count++;\n                }\n            }\n\n            // Update the minimum operations required\n            operations = min(operations, count);\n        }\n\n        return operations == INT_MAX ? -1 : operations;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-word-k-periodic","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
